refnamediv.refpurpose: This function is used to extract interest point descriptors

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: [features, validPoints] = extractFeatures(Image, points, Class, Name, Value... )

listitem.para: Input Image, should be a 2-D grayscale. The Input Image should be real
M-by-2 vector containing the list of Interest Points
The Name of the feature detecting algorithm used for interest point detection
The desired algorithm to be used for feature vector calculation
M-by-1 vector containing the strength of eack interest Point
An odd integer scalar for defining a square neighbourhood centered at each interest point for Block Detection Method
Rotation Invariance Flag specified as a boolean 'True' or 'False'. Default Value: False(0)
Length of SURF Feature Vector. Values: [64(default)|128]
M-by-1 vector containing the orientation of the detected feature in radians
M-by-2 vector containing the axes length values detected for MSER Object
M-by-1 vector containing the scale of detection of each Interest Point
M-by-1 vector containing the values of Sign of Laplacian of a SURF Object
M-by-N Feature Matrix containing M feature vectors each of length N
M-by-2 Matrix containing the set of valid points whose features have been extracted

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The function derives the descriptors from pixels surrounding an interest point, where each interest point specifies the location of the detected region center.
